name: War - The Conflict
description: A mashup between Battlefield heroes, MOBA Games, Call of Duty and Hardcore Hotline Miami speed. Become just a pawn in this battle between two sides of the conflict. Decide where to go, who to support and how long - perhaps you will be the one, with your tiny actions, to change the course of the war? But first, play some rock music and prepare to die frequently, as there are countless casualties in the war, as it, as we know, never changes.
